title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; same generate/chat/embed API surface as Python.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package exposing Ollama models as LangChain LLMs, embeddings and tool-calling agents.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich chat WebUI for Ollama (formerly Ollama-WebUI); markdown, code highlighting, model manager, RAG.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/JVM client for Ollama with Kotlin extensions; synchronous & reactive generators, progress tracking.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI that wraps Ollama REST API with readline history, syntax highlighting, themes.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Turn any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot-style code-completion service for VS Code & JetBrains.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Ready-to-run Retrieval-Augmented-Generation stack using Ollama, ChromaDB, LangChain and Streamlit.

title: chatbox-ai
summary: Cross-platform desktop chat client (Windows/Mac/Linux) supporting Ollama, OpenAI, Azure, Claude.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection & autoscaling.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Lightweight Flutter desktop app that talks to Ollama REST API; Windows/Mac/Linux binaries available.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that streams Ollama responses into channels or DMs with slash commands and per-guild model prefs.

title: ollama-nvidia-trt
summary: Experimental PR adding TensorRT-LLM backend to Ollama for up to 2× faster inference on NVIDIA GPUs.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack bot that uses Ollama for on-prem AI assistance; supports threads, code syntax highlighting, reactions.

title: ollama-mistral-ft
summary: Official guide for importing fine-tuned Mistral/Mixtral or any GGUF model into Ollama with a Modelfile.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate providing strongly-typed async client for Ollama REST API; tokio & reqwest based.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET library and CLI that wraps Ollama API; supports IAsyncEnumerable streaming and dependency injection.
